name: The Intergalactic Contests Of The Speaker
name_original: The Intergalactic Contests Of The Speaker
description: Every year the mysterious speaker holds one of his contests for any to enter but few ever do thanks to the unforgiving nature of them.  You win one of these contests and you'll get an unimaginable reward that the other contestants will stop at nothing to get. You probably wont but you can always come back the next year, and the year after that and the year after that.
